mapper.select: select m.mno, r.title, r.m_photo, r.w_dt, rp.cont, r.bno from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno left outer join r_photo rp on r.bno=rp.bno where r.mno=#{mno} group by r.title order by r.bno desc limit 0, 2

select m.mno, r.m_photo, r.title, r.w_dt, rp.cont, r.bno from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno left outer join r_photo rp on r.bno=rp.bno where r.mno=#{mno} group by r.title order by r.bno desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
select r.title, r.w_dt, r.bno from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno where r.mno=#{mno} group by r.title order by r.bno desc limit 0, 4
mapper.update: update RECIPE set TITLE=#{title}, M_PHOTO=#{m_photo}, C_NARA=#{c_nara}, C_SITU=#{c_situ}, C_COOK=#{c_cook}, C_FOOD=#{c_food}, TIME=#{time}, LEVEL=#{level} where BNO=#{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from RECIPE where mno=#{mno}

select m.mno, m.nick, m.photo, m.desct, m.category, r.bno, r.title, r.w_dt, r.m_photo, r.time, r.level, rp.cont, t.tname from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno left outer join r_photo rp on r.bno = rp.bno right outer join food f on r.bno = f.bno right outer join tag t on f.tno = t.tno where r.mno in (select mno from member where member.nick like #{nick}) order by r.bno desc

select m.mno, m.nick, m.photo, m.desct, m.category, r.bno, r.title, r.w_dt, r.m_photo, r.time, r.level, rp.cont, t.tname from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno left outer join r_photo rp on r.bno = rp.bno right outer join food f on r.bno = f.bno right outer join tag t on f.tno = t.tno where r.title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%') order by r.bno desc

select m.mno, m.nick, m.photo, m.desct, m.category, r.bno, r.title, r.w_dt, r.m_photo, r.time, r.level, rp.cont, t.tname from member m right outer join recipe r on m.mno = r.mno left outer join r_photo rp on r.bno = rp.bno right outer join food f on r.bno = f.bno right outer join tag t on f.tno = t.tno where r.bno in (select f.bno from tag t right outer join food f on t.tno = f.tno where t.tname=#{tname}) order by r.bno desc
select tname from recipe r inner join food f on r.bno = f.bno inner join tag t on f.tno=t.tno where r.bno = #{bno};
